data.name: Single Segment High Score
data.rules: Add up the score you got on each fight.  If you lose, you are allowed to continue, but you must erase the scores you got after the fight you get knocked back to (for example, if you lose to Super Macho Man and go back to Don 2, you must erase your Don 2 and Sandman scores and replace them with your new ones).  NTSC version only.
